pkgmetadata.longdescription: ODR-PadEnc is an encoder for Programme Associated Data (PAD) and includes support for MOT Slideshow (including catSLS) and DLS (including DL Plus). To encode DLS and Slideshow data, the odr-padenc tool reads images from a folder and DLS text from a file, and generates the PAD data for the encoder.

use.flag: Using ImageMagick to resize MOT Slideshow images
